pr_title: Add duplicate chat options to chatfilter

timeline.body: You need to configure your imports according to https://github.com/runelite/runelite/wiki/Code-Conventions

timeline.body: It should be configurable to collapse other message types.
timeline.bodyText: It should be configurable to collapse other message types.
timeline.bodyHTML: It should be configurable to collapse other message types.
timeline.author: raiyni

replies.bodyText: What other chat types would you want to collapse? I believe the above are all of the "regular" game chats that are repetitive. Public chat is the only other kind of chat I would think would make sense to collapse.
replies.author: CoreyForsyth

replies.bodyText: There is no way to turn off the collapsing for these types other than turning the plugin off.
replies.author: raiyni

replies.bodyText: Ahh, my apologies. I just pushed a change that adds that as a configuration. I left that out because I initially made this as a separate plugin but I ended up merging it into the chatfilter plugin instead.
replies.author: CoreyForsyth

timeline.body:

replies.bodyText: Also the description for the added configs should be written into more active statements, eg. "Collapse duplicate game chat messages into a single line"
replies.author: Nightfirecat

timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -108,4 +110,60 @@ default boolean filterLogin()
 	{
 		return false;
 	}
+
+	@ConfigItem(
+		keyName = "chatCountColor",
+		name = "Collapsed Count Color",
+		description = "Configures the color for the number of collapsed messages",
+		position = 8
+	)
+	default Color chatCountColor()
+	{
+		return new Color(0xA00080);
+	}
+
+	@ConfigItem(
+			keyName = "collapseGameChat",
+			name = "Collapse Game Chat",
+			description = "Configures if duplicate game chat can be collapsed",
+			position = 9
+	)
+	default boolean collapseGameChat()
+	{
+		return false;
+	}
+
+	@ConfigItem(
+		keyName = "collapsePlayerChat",
+		name = "Collapse Player Chat",
+		description = "Configures if duplicate player chat can be collapsed",
+		position = 10
+	)
+	default boolean collapsePlayerChat()
+	{
+		return false;
+	}
+
+	@ConfigItem(
+		keyName = "maxRepeatedPublicChats",
+		name = "Max repeated public chats",
+		description = "Blocks messages if repeated this many times. 0 is off",
+		position = 11
+	)
+	default int maxRepeatedPublicChats()
+	{
+		return 5;
+	}
+
+	@ConfigItem(
+		keyName = "maxTrackedChats",
+		name = "Max Tracked Chats",
+		description = "Configures the maximum number of chats that are tracked. Suggested 500",
+		position = 12
+	)
+	@Range(min = 100)
+	default int maxTrackedChats()
